seo.title: Age Calculator | Calculate Your Age in Years, Months, Days - Calculator Online
seo.description: Free online age calculator to calculate your exact age in years, months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds. Calculate how old you are today or on any given date.
seo.keywords: age calculator, calculate age, how old am i, date calculator, birthday calculator, years months days, exact age

header.title: Age Calculator
header.description: Calculate your exact age in years, months, days, and more. Find out how old you are today or on any specific date, plus get birthday countdown information.

calculator.title: Age Calculator
calculator.description: Enter your birth date and the date you want to calculate your age for. The calculator will show your exact age in multiple formats.

results.secondsNote: You've been alive for this many seconds!

howToUse.title: How to Use the Age Calculator

steps.title: Basic Steps
items: Enter your date of birth in the first field
Select the date you want to calculate your age for (defaults to today)
Click 'Calculate Age' to see your exact age
View detailed breakdowns in multiple time units

features.title: Features
items: Calculate exact age in years, months, and days
Show age in total days, weeks, hours, minutes, and seconds
Display days until your next birthday
Show what day of the week you were born on
Calculate age for any specific date

tips.title: Tips
items: Use the target date field to calculate your age on a specific date
Useful for official documents requiring exact age
Great for curiosity about time passage

accuracy.title: Calculation Accuracy
accuracy.description: Our age calculator uses precise date arithmetic to calculate the exact time difference between your birth date and the target date. It accounts for leap years and varying month lengths to provide accurate results.

calculations.title: How It Works
calculations.description: The calculator computes the difference between two dates by accounting for years, months, and days separately. It then converts this information into various time units like hours, minutes, and seconds for comprehensive age representation.
